EngageManifest.Title: Folio Rotator
EngageManifest.Description:
Displays the slide at 902px wide.

This template features title and description (content) on top of the image selected with a semi-transparent black background.

This template is designed especially for Engage:Folio, but can be used with any skin. to change the dimensions of the template, simply open up the style.css and alter away!
